scripts.setup: cd packages/medusa-plugin-store-credit && yarn install && yalc publish && cd ../medusa && yalc add @agilo/medusa-plugin-store-credit && yarn install && cd ../medusa-storefront && yarn install && cd ../..
scripts.start: cd packages/medusa-plugin-store-credit && yalc publish && cd ../.. && yarn run sync && cd packages/medusa && yarn run build && cd ../.. && concurrently "yarn run watch:medusa-plugin-store-credit" "yarn run start:storefront" --timings --prefix "[{index}] [{time}] =>"
scripts.start:storefront: cd packages/medusa-storefront && rm -rf .next && yarn run dev
scripts.watch:medusa-plugin-store-credit: nodemon -e js,jsx,ts,tsx --watch "packages/medusa-plugin-store-credit/src" --spawn --exec "cd packages/medusa-plugin-store-credit && yarn run prepare && cd ../.. && yarn run sync:medusa && cd packages/medusa && yarn run dev" --delay 1 --verbose
